events.message: I received the wrong item in my recent order and would like to request a full refund immediately.
The issue has been categorized as a refund request due to the customer receiving an incorrect item.
A customer support agent has been assigned to handle the refund request for the wrong item received.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear you received the wrong item. I’m here to help you with your refund request.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so we can process your refund accurately?
Sure, my order number is 987654321, and I have attached a photo showing the incorrect item that arrived instead.
Thank you for the information. We will initiate your refund immediately and you should see the money back in your account within 5-7 business days.
Thanks for the quick response and helpful solution. I appreciate the prompt attention to my refund request.
We have completed the refund transaction on our end. Please check your bank statement within a few days.
Just following up to confirm that you have received your refund and if there is anything else we can assist you with.
Since your refund issue appears to be resolved, we are closing this support case. Thank you for contacting us.
We have sent you a satisfaction survey. Please let us know how your experience was with our support team.
